snippet: Baha Mar, a resort in Nassau, Bahamas, that is scheduled to open in late 2014, chose SK&G, Las Vegas, as advertising agency of record, to handle assignments like brand strategy, creative and media services.
lead_paragraph: Baha Mar, a resort in Nassau, Bahamas, that is scheduled to open in late 2014, chose SK&G, Las Vegas, as advertising agency of record, to handle assignments like brand strategy, creative and media services.
